title: The Quest For The True Cross - Em Busca da Verdadeira Cruz DVD-R
description:
Em Busca da Verdadeira Cruz
      ( The Quest For The True Cross ) 

The program "In Search of the True Cross" is a mix of investigative documentary with historical adventure by searching the remains of the cross on which Jesus Christ was crucified.
Researchers are investigating a piece of wood, which may be the famous visor nailed to the cross of Jesus. Despite being regarded as a falsification of the medieval era, this fragment is studied and analyzed carefully, given its historical importance.
